00045 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00046 //hashlib++ includes
00047 #include "hl_md5wrapper.h"

00049 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00050 //private member functions
00051 
00058 std::string md5wrapper::hashIt(void)
00059 {
00060         //create the hash
00061         unsigned char buff[16] = "";    
00062         md5->MD5Final((unsigned char*)buff,&ctx);
00063 
00064         //converte the hash to a string and return it
00065         return convToString(buff);      
00066 }
00067 
00076 std::string md5wrapper::convToString(unsigned char *bytes)
00077 {
00078         /*
00079          * using a ostringstream to convert the hash in a
00080          * hex string
00081          */
00082         std::ostringstream os;
00083         for(int i=0; i<16; ++i)
00084         {
00085                 /*
00086                  * set the width to 2
00087                  */
00088                 os.width(2);
00089 
00090                 /*
00091                  * fill with 0
00092                  */
00093                 os.fill('0');
00094 
00095                 /*
00096                  * conv to hex
00097                  */
00098                 os << std::hex << static_cast<unsigned int>(bytes[i]);
00099         }
00100 
00101         /*
00102          * return as std::string
00103          */
00104         return os.str();
00105 }
00106 
00114 void md5wrapper::updateContext(unsigned char *data, unsigned int len)
00115 {
00116         //update 
00117         md5->MD5Update(&ctx, data, len);
00118 }
00119 
00124 void md5wrapper::resetContext(void)
00125 {
00126         //init md5
00127         md5->MD5Init(&ctx);
00128 }
00129 
00130 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00131 //public member functions
00132 
00136 md5wrapper::md5wrapper()
00137 {
00138         md5 = new MD5();
00139 }
00140 
00144 md5wrapper::~md5wrapper()
00145 {
00146         delete md5;
00147 }
